hero.title: Dedicated Devon physiotherapist restoring movement and independence after stroke, brain injury, or other neurological conditions
hero.description: Regain independence, confidence, and mobility after stroke with tailored physiotherapy delivered in the comfort and familiarity of your own home.

features.title: Why choose Devon Stroke and Neuro Physio?
features.description: Meaningful, task-specific practice in your real environment for faster carryover into daily life. One-to-one sessions without travel or waiting rooms, ideal for fatigue and reduced mobility. Family and carers involved from day one, supporting consistent practice between sessions

items.title: Home Visiting
items.description: Our experienced therapists provide comprehensive assessments and tailored treatment plans in the comfort and safety of your own home. Home visits allow us to work with you in your everyday environment, making rehabilitation practical and effective.

items.title: Experienced Neurological Physiotherapist
items.description: With over XX years of experience in the NHS working at a senior level, you can be reassured you are in safe hands

items.title: Flexibility
items.description: We offer flexible appointment times to fit around your schedule. Whether you need weekly sessions or occasional check-ins, our team is here to accommodate your needs.

items.title: Personalised Treatment Plans
items.description: No two recoveries are the same. We create customised rehabilitation programs designed around your goals, lifestyle, and progress. This personalised approach maximises your results and supports long-term independence.

items.title: Collaborative Approach
items.description: We work closely with other healthcare professionals, families, and carers to provide comprehensive support and ensure your rehabilitation fits with broader medical plans.

items.title: Empowering Education and Advice
items.description: We equip you and your family with practical advice, exercises, and strategies to maintain progress and prevent setbacks. Knowledge is a vital part of recovery, and we make sure you understand every step.
